name: Modern Skytorrents
description: A clean, subtle look for Skytorrents to replace the default old-fashioned design.
additional_info: Skytorrents is a privacy-oriented, ad-free torrent search engine. While it is quite good to use, the UI is quite basic and reminiscent of older, meaner looking search engines. This skin aims to clear it up and make the website stylish as well as functional. The skin is designed with the Roboto font in mind, however it will work without just fine. Download Roboto here
